title: Key & Peele - watch tv show streaming online
text: Watch Now PROMOTED PROMOTED Filters Streaming in: Something wrong? Let us know! Currently you are able to watch "Key & Peele" streaming on Paramount Plus Apple TV Channel , Paramount+ Roku Premium Channel, Paramount Plus Essential, Paramount Plus Premium, Paramount+ Amazon Channel or for free with ads on Pluto TV. It is also possible to buy "Key & Peele" as download on Apple TV Store, Fandango At Home, Amazon Video. Besides streaming, the series is also available on Blu-ray from Amazon DVD / Blu-ray, Barnes & Noble. You can also stream the title for free on Hoopla. Key & Peele is an American sketch comedy television show. It stars Keegan-Michael Key and Jordan Peele, both former cast members of MADtv. Each episode of the show consists of several pre-taped sketches starring the two actors, introduced by Key and Peele in front of a live studio audience. The JustWatch Daily Streaming Charts are calculated by user activity within the last 24 hours. This includes clicking on a streaming offer, adding a title to a watchlist, and marking a title as 'seen'. This includes data from ~1.7 million movie & TV show fans per day. Key & Peele is 181 on the JustWatch Daily Streaming Charts today. The TV show has moved up the charts by 287 places since yesterday. In the United States, it is currently more popular than Mr Inbetween but less popular than Going Dutch.
